text: Sheikh Hasina's corrupt and authoritarian regime, marked by violent repression and widespread injustice, has been exposed by the brave students of Bangladesh. The massacre of hundreds during the protests is a stark reminder of the brutality the people endured under her rule. As she fled in shame, the people of Bangladesh finally took a stand for justice and equality. The legacy of her 15 years in power is bloodstained with oppression and corruption. The movement led by Gen Z is a powerful call for a fresh startâ€”one that must break free from the old political system that has only oppressed the people for far too long.

text: Bangladesh e Sheikh Hasina paliyeche o durniti shesh hoyeche. Eta abar muktijuddhor ki holo? Tout niti bad den. Sunle onek jid uthe kothata. Mone hoy emon ghotona age ghote ni. Kono desh bidesher news channel e ki Bangladesh 2.0 2024 muktijuddho hoye shadhin hoyeche kew boleche? Hoyto bole ni o shudhumatro unofficial sadharon manusrai esob net e choracche. Sheikh Hasina o Khaleda Jia je mile Ershad er rajotto dur koreche taile tarao ki muktijuddho korechilo? Tao ki muktijuddho chilo? Sheikh Hasina Khaleda Jiar moto churi korechilo jodio onnanno ojoggo netader cheye valo kaj korechilo, kintu tai bole ei dhoroner Awami League o BNP er durnitibaz ojoggo netader ar sujog deya uchit na. Ar RAB o Army mile je Fakhruddin er motto joggo netar amole shob cheye boro durniti o shontrash dur korechilo, taile Fakhruddin, RAB ar Army rai to asol muktijoddha. Jonogon to chor. Chorer khoni deshe.  Fakhruddin o Dr. Yunus dui jonerie shikkhagoto joggota o shotota khubie valo royeche kintu amar mone hoy Fakhruddin Dr. Yunus er cheye valo desh dokkhotar sathe chalate pereche. Tai Fakhruddin ke ke abar khomotay ana uchit ei chatrodol o sorkar bad diye, jani na era keno eto odokkho, Fakhruddin er age to desh chalanor oviggota chilo na, tobuo onek boro unnoti kore geche. Kintu 1 number pure quality Bangladesh e kew shojjho korte pare na.

text: This reminds me of my own country's history. In the 1990s, students protested because of an economic issue. This led to the fall of my country's second president's reign. The situation in Bangladesh is similar because both protests are carried by students.
author: @vanderblank

text: The movement against job quota discrimination has now turned into a democratic movement, and this movement is being carried out peacefully by the students, my appeal to the international community is to help the students of Bangladesh to regain their democratic rights.  -And this authoritarian government has killed more than 1000 students by using firearms on peaceful protesting students and (Bangladesh Army, Navy, Police, RAB, BGB) and other law enforcement forces have used firearms on peaceful protesting female students and violated human rights.  My strong appeal to the international community and the United Nations is that the ongoing student massacre in Bangladesh should be tried in the international court, as a student I also urge you to take strong steps to stop this student massacre as soon as possible.
